# Pomnik, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship

Pomnik  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Korsze, within Kętrzyn County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland. It lies approximately  north-east of Korsze,  north-west of Kętrzyn, and  north-east of the regional capital Olsztyn.
